All rights reserved. @@ -115,4 +115,5 @@ - * {@link #onRepeatProperty onRepeat} property is invoked. If the stop time is reached and - * the cycle is not to be repeated, then the event handler registered - * with the {@link #onEndOfMediaProperty onEndOfMedia} property is invoked. A zero-relative index of - * which cycle is presently being played is maintained by {@link #currentCountProperty currentCount}. + * {@link #onRepeatProperty onRepeat} property is invoked. If the stop time is + * reached, then the event handler registered with the {@link #onEndOfMediaProperty onEndOfMedia} + * property is invoked regardless if the cycle is to be repeated or not. + * A zero-relative index of which cycle is presently being played is maintained + * by {@link #currentCountProperty currentCount}.
